training.input_x_train: This is the worst hotel ever!

On 4/7 my flight got canceled by Frontier, noreservation flight was found to fit my schedule. I had to cancel my hotel reservation, I emailed the hotel and Booking.com, the hotel refunded the full amount to Booking.com since the reservationwas made through them, Booking.com refunded me $24.65 out of $486.92, this a rubbery, they’re not even interested in offering credit for near future rebooking. It’s ver frustrating that they’re getting away with this sleazy business practices.

Hi horrible experience with the site

They cancelled my booking 3 days prior to travel. I could not get any hotel room in Srinagar

I had booked 1 month in advance

Horrible people

Horrible customer support

Not trusted, discriminate, abusive service - outstanding nonsense treatment - our service are down of the minimum.

Couldn't comminution create outgoing, just treatment and phishing.

The property 1 start are fake, and dangerous provocative.

Just incident then not accomodations or not refund.

Disappointed

Spam online campaign

Everything perfect from arrival to departure, Felt welcomed by hosts immediately, Friendly, helpful, communicated what we needed to know clearly, went above and beyond to ensure we were welcome and happy during our stay. Food was excellent - breakfast was high quality and presume local produce. Room was comfortable and to high standard. Plenty of parking.

Hi horrible experience with the site

They cancelled my booking 3 days prior to travel. I could not get any hotel room in Srinagar

I had booked 1 month in advance

Horrible people

Horrible customer support

I booked a hotel on Booking .com app as I have done for at least 5 years spending thousands of pounds.

My credit card was charged twice by TPI a scam company within Booking.com.

There joke of a customer services.Who employ people who do care and may even be criminals.Just keep passing you from one to another.Making up stories as you prove them wrong.Hipefully they will go bust soon.The company is rotten from the top.As they took public money during Covid from the dutch government whilst pay big dividends to share holders .

If you value your money never deal with this company you have been warned by a person who cares

My booking.com booking no was 2405.963.426.

They cheated me in collaboration with their service partner Park lane Apartment clarges Appartment London.

I booked this apartment thru booking.com from 19th to 23rd March22 on a heavy price of 155000, my spouse had a back injury and when I called hotel they mentioned they have fully functional elevators , when I reached No lift was working and manager was not ready to even talk on call, I immidately called booking.com, they suggested me to book another place and they will refund the paid amount, I booked as suggested and paid another hotel about 20% more for last minute and to my surprise now booking.com is deniying to refund the money.

Pls do not trust these cheaters, they do these frauds in collaboration with their partner properties.

Beware
All the staff were both very welcoming and highly efficient. The bedrooms and the sitting rooms were attractive and comfortable. The food was excellent
